name: @ryuran/parse-sizes
description: A non-strict but robust javascript parser for the [HTML5 sizes] (http://www.w3.org/html/wg/drafts/html/master/embedded-content.html#attr-img-sizes) attribute, based on the [WHATWG reference algorithm] (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/embedded-content.html#parse-a-sizes-attribute). It has an extensive test suite.
